me ayurinma 27 wana dina nugegoda raliyata sahabhagiwana mathi amathiwarunge daruwantada siragewalwala laginnata siduwana bawata ekthara maha amathiwarayeku eeye dinaye prasiddhiye prakasha kara athi bawath, deshapalanagnyayin duk windima prashnayak nowunath, owunge daruwan niraparade dukwindiya yuthu nathi bawin mema raliyata ekwimata siti ayata eknowana lesa upades dun bawa rajapaksha mahatha kiya sitiye ada (24) wishesha prakashayak sidukaramini.
danawath wagema duppath minisunda me athara wanawa namuth ada api obata kiyanna yanne ewani dhanawathekuge puduma hithena awamangalya...
“aa aa eeka misak...
eda parlimenthuwata aapu mama, eeta passe mathiwaranayen parajaya wenawa.
man hithuwe eeka man kuda kotasak pamanak dana athi wani amarikanu kathawaka kopiyak kiyayi.
pitakotuwa shri langama bas nawathumpala asala pihiti bodhin wahanse wasara 191 k parani ithihasayak athi sthanayaki.
enisa yanthrika kramayakata wigraha karamin lingika adhyapanaya labadima apahasu ya.
ewelehi ema kamaraye athulu rahas dorak ari athbomba praharayak ella wina.
ee athara wiwaha jiwithaya yanu badra yauwanaya thula gihi jiwithayaka sthira adithalama dama ganimaki.

ithin ee biyar bageth bila hondata kala nindata giya nisa pahuwada ude ful fit eke nagitta.ampara wage kashtaka paththaka godak awidala hondatama mahansi wela inna welawaka mahansiya niwanna unath, nuwara eliya wage hithala palathaka hithale gal wela inna welawaka hithala nathikarannath hondata kul wechchara biyar walata karanna puluwan wima maha puduma wadak (man kiwwe me man gana) me deshaguna dekatama me widihata galapena wena bima jathiyak nam mata kalpana wenne naha.(ada ude indan hayiyen wahinawa kul biyar ekak thibba nam tikak anga rath wenna maru kiyala hithena nisa biyar gana liwwe.)

ampara nagaraye aapana shalawakin aahara laba ganimata giya pirisakata ema aahara wala thibi pethi wisheshayak hamuwimath samanga athiwu gatuma sambandhayen pasugiya dinawala wishala kathabahak athi wu athara ema aapana shalawe sewaya kala sinhala tharunayeku ema siduwima wisthara kale pahatha aakarayen..
sinhalayan nirmanaya kala wiyuktha ma shasthraya wyakaranaya wu bawin ese wuye yayi sithami.

ohu kiya sitiye wasantha senanayaka mahatha aanduwata sahaya dakwana bawayi.ohu pasugiyada sancharaka ha wanajiwi kabinat amathya dhuraye diwurum dun athara, parlimenthuwe nawa sasiwaraya pawathi ikuth 14 wanada ohu siya amathya dhurayen iwath wi yali eksath jathika pakshaya wetha sahaya pala karana bawa sandahan kala.
ethakota inne kathi enakan balagena.
passe jathika layisthuwen gaththata kamak na..
mama baragaththa wada kotasakma thawa karanna thiyenawa.
madhyawedin api gana liwwa kiyala balapamak wenne naha.
me athara eeye rathiye uthuru koriyanu nayaka kim jong un singappuruwe widi sancharayaka da niratha wiya.

janatha chandayakin wathman sandhana aanduwa peralimata nohaki bawa hondin danna warthamana wiruddha pakshayata awashya wi aththe kese milanga janadhipathiwaranaya ha parlimenthu maha mathiwaranayata pera rata thula yam arajika thaththwayak athi kirimata yi.ee sandaha jiniwa meheyuma demala dayasporawe sahaya athiwa jathyantharayen kriyathmaka wana athara eeta samagamiwa rata thula da yam wirodhayak mathu kirima sandaha atham deshapalana paksha ha piris pela gasi sitithi.wathman aanduwata erehiwa prabala janamathayak godanagimata apohosath bawin ee sandaha deshiyawa ha jathyantharawa yam yam upakrama sewima bedumwadayata kade yana aandu wirodhinta awashyawa thibe.mada peradiga rosa wasanthaya namin handinwena wiwidha wasantha ek ek ratawal asthawara kirima sandaha pasugiya kalaya thula yodagath athara mehidi mulikawa kriya kale amerikanu eksath janapadaya pramukha batahira ratawal ya.libiyawe, eejipthuwe, siriyawe mema rosa wasanthaya athikota ema ratawal asthawara kara emagin deshapalana wasi laba ganimata amerikawa upakramashiliwa kriya kala bawa norahasaki.
eheth blog kiyawannan thakimak karana bawa dakima sathutata karunaki.
ihatha dakwana lada awasthawe purushayage rupaya ohuge bhawanga chiththaya magin athikarana rupaya nowe.
kal laba di sthawara niyoga athhituwanne nathiwa wenath yojanawak sammatha kara gannata baridayi ehidi janadhipathiwaraya prashna kala.
ape lokkata thiyenawa podi wayin faktariyak..
ada nam ese natha.

mama guruwarayek nowe.esema mata guruwarun gana wenama wiwechanayakda atha.eya me siduwimen pasuwa liyannata adahas karayi.siyalla sapekshaya.ehidi polisiya saha guruwaraya kiyana waththin deka thula wadath yahapath kumakda yanna thiranaya kirima ekinekage samaja athdakim padanam karagena kala hakiya.mama kiyanne me guruwariyage saha polis niladhariyage kriyakarakam hudekala siduwim pamanaya.eya pudgala kendriyawa wimasanu wina wruththiyamaya washayen sambandha kara wimasimedi wruththimaya washayen gurukamata agathiyak saha polisiye thanathurata anawashya dipthiyak ekwana bawaya.me samastha guruwaraya saha samastha polisiya lesa huwa dakwena ayure prakasha nusudusu bawaya
kalabala wenda epa...
eka paratama mama aharune husma ganna baruwa.
mehidi amathiwaraya niladharin amathamin kiya sitiye thaman athulu rajya sewakayan mahajanathawage mudalwalin nadaththuwana pirisak bawath eya sihiye thabagena katayuthu kirima athyawashya bawathya.
mama kana digena hitiya..
kawuruth dakkada danne na, umbae poth deddi uge athata, kanayage ase kandulak dilisenawa panaganna bariwa.
inpasu wiwapath wana aya nobo dinakin ma wandambauwak bawata pathwanni ya.

dewiyane mechchara kal chithrapati wala kollata indala thiyenne naki ankalla tikakne kiyala mata ethakotayi therune.anthimata thamayi me nalu battawa hambune, tikak withara 20 ganan wala penumak thiyana ekama naluwa thamayi me mata hithuna widiyata.niliyangeth thathwaya esemayi ( ho wada shochaniyayi) issarahata balamu api wikalpekata yanna puluwanda kiyala.
therane nathi hindayi ahuwe.
honda satanak demu.
me rate deshapalanaye raja karana indiyanu wirodhaye aarambhaya ee aashrayen athiwu thaththwayak lesa salakiya hakiya.
amma mage dakunu athe thibunu pachchaya diha baluwa ..papuwa aayemath dig dig gawa .
lankawa kusalanaya jayagrahanaya karayi nam mada kamathi athara eya saba jayagrahanayak kota mada salakami.
apayata watimata me sansaraya thula gaman karana oonama kenakuta siduwiya haki ya.
me mohotha wanawita widhayaka janadhipathi kramaya athi kala eksath jathika pakshaya pawa ema kramaya wenas kirimata sudanamwa siti.
me budu pilime wada awasan nokarapu ekak...
manasika wyakulatha, sem ro, watha wedana saha papuwa aashritha wedanawanta ida atha.
widyalaya - yapanaya thakshana widyalaya lesada, kurunagala
eeth ee uththare yata thibuna katuka aththa deke panthiye ticha nihanda kala bawa mata therune eda...
eeth aayama chandayakwath illanta marata sadacharathmaka ayithiyak na....
anek athata mewani haritha pa්radeshawalin labena wenath pa්rayojana atha.
husma ganime ayithiya
malawunta yachnya kirima ha owun samaga kathakirima gana bayibalaye sadahan wanne kumakda?

meyin apa mudawalanuyi kiyamin sak dewindunta kannalaw karana kalhi me puwath salawu sak dewindu thamanta swabhawadharmaya palanaya kala nowana bawa dana upaya yodawa sak wiskam dewindu pawa upakara ganna chathurya senarathanange undukapuchchaya ta adhigruhitha wiya..
kurula, lapa, kalal aadiya iwath weyi.
eksath janapada nambauruwe wenasa arambaune tramp samaga no we.
thaththage ‘me saumya rathri’ githaya punsiri soyisa wachana wenas kara gayana keruwa.

washishtayeni, ikbiththen ee sathnata badalathawa athurudahan wu kalhi nosa polawehi hatagena pasena, kudu nathi, dahaweyiya nathi, suwandawatha sahal ma pala kota athi hal wesesek pahala wiya, yam sahalak sawas welehi sawas bojunata geneth da, pasu dina udasana eya pasune yali du wadune weyi.
ehidi ohu mema daruwawa wahama rohalgatha karana lesa upades labadi atha.
ow matath oya anith hamuduruwo mathakayi.
habayi ee welawata bohoma ‘sundara dewal’ hamuwenawa.
ithin naliya ee minissunge aagamika wishwasayan saha adahili - charithra widhi wenuwen oba dakwu sahayogayata sthuthi kirimata kamathiyi....
wadak na sasindu ooka kettu wadiyi badawala wage.
eya wi wagawa dakinne lankawe gowin duppath kirimata hethuwi thibena boga wagawak lesaya.
indiyawe madhya pradeshayedi mema athadanguwata ganima sidukara athi bawa bi.bi.si. puwath sewaya thorathuru wartha kaleya.
eeth welunu kola tikak kudu tikak gena­woth koho­mada handu­na­ganne kiyana gata­luwa pana nagi­nawa.
dan nan polawa palana gihin eha paththen mathu wenna tharan ...
ese peni sitimin thamange sithwala athi charitha rangapathi.
laksha ataka paudgalika sewakayanta kisima sahanayak na.
kathawa nan kiyawala na, kaka.
-nelum male pethi kadala-

galla distha්rikkaya bhara niyojya polispathi hektar dharmasirita erehi allas ho dushana mardhana komishan sabha panathe 70 i waganthiya yatathe 2007 warshaye sidu wu siddhiyak sambandhayen wimarshanayak pawathwimen anathuruwa ese nadu pawara atha.

“me wage prashna thiyenawa nam aadhara bedadime lekhana disthrik lekamwarun magin pariksha kirima sudusuyi” maithri yojana kale asadharanayak nowana aakarayata niyan aadhara beda dena lesa es.bi. ta upades demini.
makathi gugurannata gath wita nihandawima wadath honda bawa weyinbarg athdakimen dana siti nisa ohu kale urahis gassa kathawa wenathakata harawimayi.
meya apage wipakshika paddhathiya thula athi karagath mema paddhathiye modalaya nawatha yomu kirima, mathaka thaba ganima saha mema wadagath wipakaya yali awadharanaya kirimata upakara karayi.
aa siya osap dina pasuwana thuru niwasin pitatha wenama kutiyaka sitiya yuthuya.
methanin ahana gaman ithiri tika kiyawannako...ada ude idala kipa sarayakma mama me sinduwa ahuwa.

dan oba wisin sambandha karagath mobayil upangaya penwanawa atha...
ee tika ohu diwwe natamin...
ithama sawadanawa akuren akura , sidu wimen sidu wima galapala liyapu bawa therenawa..
his bima kes ekak hoyaganna thibbe nadda ha...
eda mama godak mahansi welath hitiye.
ghathakayan soya kala meheyum waladi jum thahirge maranayata wagakiwayuthu bawata saka kerena thawath tharunayan kihipa deneku polis wedi paharin marumuwata path wi athi bawayi pawasenne.
saudi arabiya saha iranaya athara pawathina bala aragalaya kalapiya mattame sithala yuddhayak lesa handinwiya haka.

anek samagama bidioo nam wiganaka samagamayi.
